dcterms:creator: N. Addor
A. J. Newman
N. Mizukami
M. P. Clark
dcterms:description: The CAMELS dataset contains meteorological forcings, streamflow observations, and attributes for 671 basins in the conterminous United States (CONUS).
dcterms:title: CAMELS (Catchment Attributes and Meteorology for Large-sample Studies)

dcterms:creator: Y. Xia

Q. Duan

D. Mocko
dcterms:description: The NLDAS dataset provides meteorological forcings used to run hydrologic models, including precipitation, temperature, and potential evapotranspiration.
dcterms:title: NLDAS (North American Land Data Assimilation System)

dcterms:creator: Q. Mu
M. Zhao
S. W. Running
dcterms:description: The MOD16-MT dataset provides estimates of terrestrial surface evapotranspiration based on satellite data and meteorological reanalysis.
dcterms:title: MOD16-MT (MODIS Evapotranspiration)

dcterms:creator: A. R. Ladson
R. Brown
B. Neal
R. Nathan
dcterms:description: The BFIL13 dataset provides a standard approach to baseflow separation using the Lyne and Hollick filter applied to streamflow hydrographs.
dcterms:title: BFIL13 (Baseflow Index derived from Ladson et al.)
